title: Is my prayer valid if I recite Fateha fast (quickly)? - Assim al hakeem
transcript: as long as the fatiha itself is understood and you're reciting it correctly no the the the speed is irrelevant and i'm telling you right now that is fast but it's comprehendable and it's totally uh valid is it the best no it's not the best when reciting the quran we have to recite it slowly and contemplate upon it but it is valid inshallah
